description:
With this DLC you'll unlock: 

- your own dog that follows you everywhere! (Woof!)
- active bonus that increases the items collected in the barn by 30% 
- 250 extra gems to spend on: unlocking random characters, instant rain event, harvest upgrade and more!

Buy new skins for gems, have fun with your new friend and use the bonus to make your farm grow even faster!
name: Farm Land: Puppy
